Translations.Text: qul lilladhina kafaru in yantahu yugh'far lahum ma qad salafa wa-in yaʿudu faqad madat sunnatu l-awalina
waqatiluhum hatta la takuna fit'natun wayakuna l-dinu kulluhu lillahi fa-ini intahaw fa-inna l-laha bima yaʿmaluna basirun
wa-in tawallaw fa-iʿ'lamu anna l-laha mawlakum niʿ'ma l-mawla waniʿ'ma l-nasiru

wa-iʿ'lamu annama ghanim'tum min shayin fa-anna lillahi khumusahu walilrrasuli walidhi l-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni l-sabili in kuntum amantum bil-lahi wama anzalna ʿala ʿabdina yawma l-fur'qani yawma l-taqa l-jamʿani wal-lahu ʿala kulli shayin qadirun

idh antum bil-ʿud'wati l-dun'ya wahum bil-ʿud'wati l-qus'wa wal-rakbu asfala minkum walaw tawaʿadttum la-ikh'talaftum fi l-miʿadi walakin liyaqdiya l-lahu amran kana mafʿulan liyahlika man halaka ʿan bayyinatin wayahya man hayya ʿan bayyinatin wa-inna l-laha lasamiʿun ʿalimun
idh yurikahumu l-lahu fi manamika qalilan walaw arakahum kathiran lafashil'tum walatanazaʿtum fi l-amri walakinna l-laha sallama innahu ʿalimun bidhati l-suduri
wa-idh yurikumuhum idhi l-taqaytum fi aʿyunikum qalilan wayuqallilukum fi aʿyunihim liyaqdiya l-lahu amran kana mafʿulan wa-ila l-lahi tur'jaʿu l-umuru
